Companies

Activision

Activision Publishing, Inc. is an American video game publisher based in Santa Monica, California. Mainly known for World of Warcraft.

Cd Projekt Red

CD Projekt S.A. is a Polish video game developer, publisher and distributor based in Warsaw. Mainly known for Cyberpunk 2077 and the Witcher.
